description:
Dynamic, high growth LA based company is looking for a Senior Supply Chain Manager!

  • Forecasting, budgeting- long range, short range plans
  • Review inventory reconciliations
  • Oversee inventory adjustments
  • Partner with the Operations
  • Lead Transfer Price reconciliations
  • Conduct gross margin variance analysis
  • Drive value-creation initiatives within the supply chain

The successful candidate will have the following qualifications:


  • Bachelor’s degree in finance, Accounting, , or related field; MBA or advanced degree preferred.
  • Strength in inventory management, cost accounting principles, and supply chain operations.
